lead_paragraph: The French band Alcest played its first New York show in its first American tour at the Studio at Webster Hall on Thursday.
snippet: The French band Alcest played its first New York show in its first American tour at the Studio at Webster Hall on Thursday.

headline.main: Take a Little Metal, Add a Bit of Elegance
headline.seo: The French Band Alcest Performs at Webster Hall
headline.print_headline: Take a Little Metal, Add a Bit of Elegance
